description: CSS file for theme management and styling of the Tic Tac Toe application, including variables for light and dark themes, responsive design, and animations.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application class for the Tic Tac Toe frontend, providing styling for layout and theme.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header section of the application, styled for centered content and theme adaptability.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Stylings for the application logo, including animation effects.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styling for links within the application, with color transitions.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button for toggling between light and dark themes, with interactive styles.
